attributes.action: ban the re-sale (touting) of event tickets at inflated prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Touting ruins events for everybody. Many fans are prevented from seeing their favourite teams/bands/events and all so touts can earn some pocket money. So many people are ripped off, and it needs to stop. Basically, the time of paying >£150 for a £25 ticket need to end. 
What needs to happen, is the sale of tickets (above face-value) has to be made illegal on eBay. The sale outside event doors needs to be stopped and official return/resale facilities require setting up. Even a similar process as that used at Glastonbury Festival could be implemented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
